bibl.title: P. Bonon. 4 and Virgil, Aen. 6, yet again.
bibl.note: On the relationship between P. Bon. 4 (= Pack2 1801) and VIRGIL, Aen. VI. "If Anon. Bonon. wrote before Virgil, it is not certain that Virgil used him and not their common source; if he wrote after, then it seems increasingly likely that he did not use Virgil but rather the common source and that alone."
bibl.seg: HORSFALL Nicholas, P. Bonon. 4 and Virgil, Aen. 6, yet again.

On the relationship between P. Bon. 4 (= Pack2 1801) and VIRGIL, Aen. VI. "If Anon. Bonon. wrote before Virgil, it is not certain that Virgil used him and not their common source; if he wrote after, then it seems increasingly likely that he did not use Virgil but rather the common source and that alone."
